name: WP Live Debug
author: Xenos (xkon) Konstantinos

sections.description: Simply enable the plugin and go to the WP Live Debug tab to see your debug.log. The view is refreshed every 3 seconds.
sections.installation:
From within WordPress

  • Visit Plugins > Add New
  • Search for WP Live Debug
  • Click the Install Now button to install the plugin
  • Click the Activate button to activate the plugin

Manually

  • Unzip the downloaded package
  • Upload wp-live-debug directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
4.9.4.2

  • Update required PHP to 5.3.
  • Update required WordPress version to 4.8.

4.9.4.1

  • Fixed removing ‘n’ from the debug view.

4.9.4

  • Code refactoring.
  • Minor fixes.

4.9.2.1

  • Fixed faulty Plugin URI.

4.9.2

  • Checks if file exists first to avoid errors.
  • Bumping version to follow WordPress releases.

1.0.1

  • Fixed No such file or directory warning

1.0.0

  • Initial Release
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

From within WordPress

  • Visit Plugins > Add New
  • Search for WP Live Debug
  • Click the Install Now button to install the plugin
  • Click the Activate button to activate the plugin

Manually

  • Unzip the downloaded package
  • Upload wp-live-debug directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Enables debugging and adds a screen into the WordPress Admin to view the debug.log.
description: Simply enable the plugin and go to the WP Live Debug tab to see your debug.log. The view is refreshed every 3 seconds.
